title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 361 - Case Management Activities For Pregnant And Parenting Adolescents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 361 - Case Management Activities For Pregnant And Parenting Adolescents

§ 361.0 - Scope
§ 361.1 - Definitions
§ 361.2 - Administrative requirements
§ 361.3 - Prohibited activities
§ 361.4 - Eligibility

§ 361.6 - Intake and screening of cases
§ 361.7 - Initial contacts
§ 361.8 - Initial interviews and needs assessments; case openings; interim plans
§ 361.9 - Comprehensive needs assessments; identifying goals, tasks and providers; personal plans
§ 361.10 - Referrals to, and monitoring of, services and assistance
§ 361.11 - Amending and reevaluating personal plans
§ 361.12 - Individual case records
§ 361.13 - Closing and reopening cases

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 361

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 409-k

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
